openapi: "3.0.1"
tags:
- name: used-tag
  description: a tag referenced in the operations
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Swagger Petstore
paths:
  /pets:
    get:
      tags:
      - used-tag
      responses: {}
    post:               # Noncompliant {{Associate a tag to this operation.}}
      responses:
        default:
          description: the default response
